languages.text: "Я рекрутирую этих людей — они пройдут суровую муштру и станут новым поколением гвардейцев на Даргонусе".
"I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."
languages.original_text: "Я рекрутирую этих людей — они пройдут суровую муштру и станут новым поколением гвардейцев на Даргонусе".

traits.locale_text: "I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."
"I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."
"I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."
"I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."
"I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."
"I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."

languages.text: “我准备把这些人招募入伍。他们会在达戈努斯接受严酷的训练，成为新一代帝国卫队士兵。”
languages.original_text: "I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."

traits.locale_text: “我准备把这些人招募入伍。他们会在达戈努斯接受严酷的训练，成为新一代帝国卫队士兵。”

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}は彼らをリクルートしている。彼らはダルゴナスで厳格な訓練を受け、新世代のガーズマンとなるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}は彼らをリクルートしている。彼らはダルゴナスで厳格な訓練を受け、新世代のガーズマンとなるだろう」

languages.text: «Estoy reclutando a esta gente. Se someterá a un entrenamiento riguroso en Dargonus para convertirse en una nueva generación de la Guardia Imperial».
languages.original_text: "I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy reclutando a esta gente. Se someterá a un entrenamiento riguroso en Dargonus para convertirse en una nueva generación de la Guardia Imperial».

languages.text: "Ich rekrutiere diese Leute – sie erhalten auf Dargonus eine strenge Ausbildung und werden dann zur nächsten Soldatengeneration."
languages.original_text: "I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."

traits.locale_text: "Ich rekrutiere diese Leute – sie erhalten auf Dargonus eine strenge Ausbildung und werden dann zur nächsten Soldatengeneration."

languages.text: "Bu insanları emrim altına alıyorum. Dargonus'ta sıkı talimlerden geçip yeni Muhafız neslini oluşturacaklar."
languages.original_text: "I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."

traits.locale_text: "Bu insanları emrim altına alıyorum. Dargonus'ta sıkı talimlerden geçip Muhafızlar'ın yeni jenerasyonu olacaklar."

languages.text: « Je recrute ces gens. Ils suivront un entraînement rigoureux sur Dargonus et deviendront les prochains gardes. »
languages.original_text: "I am recruiting these people — they will undergo rigorous training on Dargonus and become a new generation of Guardsmen."

traits.locale_text: « Je recrute ces gens. Ils suivront un entraînement rigoureux sur Dragonus et deviendront les prochains gardes. »
